bootDeviceExternal: Set SW2 dip switch to position 1:on, 2:on. Also, make sure jumpers J20 and J33 are set towards the edge of the board.
Press the power switch PWR SW to the on position. Press and hold for 1 second the SW3 POWER push button.
bootDevice: Set SW2 dip switch to position 1:off, 2:off
Press the power switch PWR SW to the on position. Press and hold for 1 second the SW3 POWER push button
